Verses: 1 en Kanmalaiyaagiya Karththaave, Ummai Nokkik Kooppidugiren; Neer Kelaadhavarpola Mavunamaayiraadheyum; Neer Mavunamaayirundhaal Naan Kuzhiyil Irangugiravargalukku Oppaaven.
2 naan Ummai Nokkich Saththamittu, Ummudaiya Parisuththa Sannidhikku Neraagak Kaiyedukkaiyil, En Vinnappangalin Saththaththaik Kettarulum.
3 ayalaanukkuch Samaadhaana Vaazhththudhalaich Solliyum, Thangal Irudhayangalil Pollaappai Vaiththirukkira Thunmaarkkarodum Akkiramakkaararodum Ennai Vaarikkollaadheyum.

4 avargaludaiya Kiriyaigalukkum Avargalutaiya Nadaththaigalin Pollaangukkum Thakkadhaaga Avargalukkuch Seyyum; Avargal Kaigalin Seygaikkuththakkadhaaga Avargalukku Aliyum, Avargalukkuch Sarikkuch Sarikkattum.
5 avargal Karththarudaiya Seygaigalaiyum Avar Karaththin Kiriyaigalaiyum Gavaniyaadhabadiyaal, Avargalai Idiththuppoduvaar, Avargalaik Kattamaattaar.
6 karththarukku Sthoththiram; Avar En Vinnappangalin Saththaththaik Kettaar.
7 karththar En Belanum En Kedagamumaayirukkiraar; En Irudhayam Avarai Nambiyirundhadhu; Naan Sagaayam Petren; Aagaiyaal En Irudhayam Kalikoorugiradhu; En Paattinaal Avaraith Thudhippen.
8 karththar Avargaludaiya Belan; Avare Thaam Abishegampanninavanukku Aranaana Adaikkalamaanavar.
9 dhevareer Umadhu Janaththai Ratchiththu, Umadhu Sudhandharaththai Aaseervadhiyum; Avargalaip Poshiththu, Avargalai Endrendraikkum Uyarththiyarulum.
